context.question: Please provide the comprehensive MISSION.md document that defines the Unified Business Management System's purpose, goals, constraints, and success criteria.
context.why_escalating: The project initialization requires a clearly defined mission document to guide all agent decisions. Without it, the multi-agent system cannot align on project objectives, scope boundaries, or success metrics.
context.mission_alignment_concern: Missing mission definition prevents workflow progression to research stage

options.name: Provide MISSION.md file
options.description: Human creates comprehensive MISSION.md with all required sections (Purpose, Business Context, Functional Requirements, Technical Constraints, Success Criteria)
pros: Provides clear boundaries for all agents
cons: Must be thorough to be effective
options.timeline_impact: Delays start by 1-2 hours for mission documentation
options.reasoning: A well-defined mission is the foundation of successful multi-agent development. It prevents scope creep, misalignment, and rework.

options.name: Use minimal mission template
options.description: Orchestrator creates basic MISSION.md template that human fills in incrementally as project progresses
pros: Can iterate on mission as understanding evolves
cons: Agents may make assumptions needing correction
Potential for misalignment early in project
options.timeline_impact: Can start immediately, but may require revisions
options.reasoning: While faster, this approach risks misalignment and rework. The mission should inform technical decisions, not evolve from them.

recommendation.rationale: For a $15,000 ERP system managing 3 businesses, clarity is critical. The mission document will guide technology selection, architecture decisions, and feature prioritization. Investing 1-2 hours now will save days of rework later.
recommendation.alternative_if: Only choose option_b if the mission is truly undefined and needs to emerge from initial research, but this is not recommended for an ERP system with clear business context.

impact_if_delayed: Cannot proceed to research stage. Agents cannot begin technical investigation without understanding project goals, constraints, and success criteria.

human_response.reasoning: Comprehensive MISSION.md has been created with all required sections including: Mission Statement, Business Context (3 businesses), Success Criteria (mobile-first), Functional Requirements (Water, Laundry, Retail, Financial Core, User Management, M-Pesa, BI, Reporting), Technical Constraints (Django, PostgreSQL, PWA), Non-Functional Requirements (Performance, Security, Mobile-First Design), Technical Architecture Guidance, Integration Requirements, Deployment Plan, Acceptance Criteria, and Risk Mitigation.
key_highlights: Primary user: Business owner on mobile phone (90% of operations)
Critical: Record sale in <30 seconds on mobile

instructions_for_human: INSTRUCTIONS: (1) Create comprehensive MISSION.md file in project root with sections: Purpose, Business Context, Functional Requirements, Technical Constraints, Success Criteria, Budget/Timeline, User Stories. (2) Move this escalation file to .ai/escalations/resolved/. (3) Add your decision to 'human_response' section below confirming mission is complete.
resolution_notes: Mission document created and validated. Contains comprehensive requirements for multi-business ERP system with mobile-first design. Ready to proceed to research stage.
